full_summary:
=======

**Request for Proposal - Multiple Victoria-Class Spares (Valves, Safety Relief and Switch Boxes)**

**Title:** Multiple Victoria-Class Spares (Valves, Safety Relief and Switch Boxes)
**Description:** The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below for a Request for Proposal (RFP) process. The delivery is requested at Canadian Forces Bases Esquimalt and Halifax.

**Scope:**

* GSIN N4820: Safety Relief Valves (8 units for CFB Esquimalt, 4 units for CFB Halifax)
* Part Number: LBB-30850
* NCAGE: U4265
* Unit of Issue: Each
* GSIN N5930: Switch Boxes (4 units for CFB Halifax, 6 units for CFB Esquimalt)
* Part Number: 0J0159001
* NCAGE: K0216
* Unit of Issue: Each

**Proposal Requirements:**

* Respondents must indicate the brand name and model, or part number and NCAGE for any equivalent or substitute product offered.
* Bidders can submit proposals in either English or French.

**Submission Documents:**

* Available on the Canada Buy Service: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...)
* Documents may be presented in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**

* Contact Name: Cassandra Leach
* Email: cassandra.leach@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 999-999-9999
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Tender Closing Date:** 31 March 2023 at 14:00 hours
Please note that this tender has already expired.
